values: 硬的；坚硬的；坚固的；牢固的；困难的；艰难的；艰苦的；难以忍受的；耗费力的；用力的；努力的；严峻的；严格的；强烈的；猛烈的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；耐用的；难懂的；含无机盐的（尤指水）；硬音的；酒精浓度高的
努力地；艰难地；辛苦地；猛烈地；坚固地；坚硬地；坚定地；牢固地；紧密地；彻底地；完全地；尽力地；费力地；沉重地；严厉地；狠心地
硬地；（尤指供船只上下的）坚实岸边；硬海滩；强迫苦役

synonym.mean: 努力的；硬的；困难的；辛苦的；确实的；严厉的；猛烈的；冷酷无情的
努力地；困难地；辛苦地；接近地；猛烈地；牢固地

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 坚强的；勇敢的；能吃苦耐劳的；鲁莽的
强壮的人；耐寒植物；方柄凿
变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷
使…变硬；使…坚强；使…冷酷；使…麻木不仁

word_mean_info__list.difference: 比hard较为正式，侧重需要特别的能力、智力、判断力、技巧或勇气才能克服障碍。也可指深奥或抽象的难题。
含义广，通俗用词，与easy相对，泛指任何难理解，不好处理或不易做的事。
着重质地紧密、坚实和无间隙，含有在外部压力下仍可保持原有形状的意味。
侧重指质地坚硬、不易切割或有弹性，一旦变形会很快恢复原形。
侧重有抗拒压力或拉力的性质，但不一定有弹性。

word_group.brief_definition: 通过痛苦的经历, 通过出错, 来之不易
板上钉钉, 不容更改；(规定）硬性的
(向争论或打败的对方表示继续友好)别往心里去, 别记恨
难懂, 费力；缺少乐趣的
故作姿态, 故作冷漠
中坚力量；中坚分子；忠实信徒；铁杆分子；恪守教条者；碎石；硬派音乐；赤裸裸的色情作品

bilingual.source: It can broken a hard glass bottle.
bilingual.target: 它能将一只坚固的玻璃杯撑破.

list.abstract: 《hard》是由美国歌手Rihanna与Jeezy演唱的歌曲。收录于Rihanna2009年11月23日发行的专辑《Rated R》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Bumming hard, guys. Bumming hard.
How hard did she stomp? Very hard. Okay I'm good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她践踏得多狠？相当狠。好吧，好受多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Studying is hard and boring. Teaching is hard and boring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学习很困难很枯燥，教书很困难很枯燥。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a really hard choice.
Okay. Rock, hard place. Me.
It's not that hard to learn.
Now, for the actual hard part.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，才是真正困难的部分。

yingyinNormal.en: I've had a very long, hard day.
How was your nap? I slept hard.
Wow, I find that hard to believe.
You work hard, you pay your taxes…
Wow. That sounds hard to pull off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，这我可有点承受不起啊。

yingyinNormal.en: That shouldn't be too hard to spot.
Come on, Max, it can't be that hard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托 Max 这没那么难吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Hard to talk about. I'm sure. Sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谈这话题很难。那是肯定的。对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Being pregnant is hard on your tummy.
It's just hard for her to say goodbye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是不舍得我们，在和我们说再见。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Hard? What do you know about it?
Really? See? Lies. They're not that hard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？瞧？撒谎一点都不难。

yingyinNormal.en: It's hard to let go. Faction before blood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抛弃过去并非易事。派别高于血脉。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (水质)硬的; 酒精浓度高的
完全地; 最大程度上地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 更困难的；更硬的；更冷酷无情的；更努力的；（hard的比较级）
v. 变硬；使冷酷无情；变明确；升水

word_family.mean: adj. 坚实的；牢固的；坚硬的；猛烈的；沉重的；难以忍受的；困苦的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；有力的；强烈的；含无机盐的；软腭爆破音

sense_info_list.en: difficult to do or to understand

examination_example.sentence: It's not <highlight>hard</highlight> to imagine a similar reversal happening in London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不难想象，类似的逆转也会发生在伦敦。

examination_example.sentence: It's not as <highlight>hard</highlight> for them to transform their thought processes as it is for older students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们来说，转变思维过程并不像对高年级学生那样困难。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>hard</highlight>, the state argues, for judges to assess the implications of new and rapidly changing technologies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该州认为，法官很难评估快速变化的新技术的影响。

sense_info_list.en: carried on with steady and earnest effort

examination_example.sentence: "It's a really <highlight>hard</highlight> thing to do and it's a tremendous luxury that BuzzFeed doesn't have a legacy business," Peretti remarked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Peretti表示：“BuzzFeed没有传统业务，这是一件非常困难的事情，也是一件非常奢侈的事情。”

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Hard</highlight> times may hold you down at what usually seems like the most inopportune time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艰难的时刻可能会在最不合时宜的时候让你陷入困境。

examination_example.sentence: We will have to wait and see exactly how these <highlight>hard</highlight> times will reshape our social fabric.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们要拭目以待，看看这些艰难时期将如何重塑我们的社会结构。

sense_info_list.en: with great effort or energy

examination_example.sentence: Having said all of the above, it's important to add that we shouldn't try too <highlight>hard</highlight> to be happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 综上所述，还有一点很重要，那就是我们不应该为了快乐而太过努力。

examination_example.sentence: Law-school debt means that they have to work fearsomely <highlight>hard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法学院的债务意味着他们必须非常努力地工作。

examination_example.sentence: No one tries <highlight>harder</highlight> than the jobless to find silver linings in this national economic disaster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人比失业者更努力地在这场全国性的经济灾难中寻找一线希望。

examination_example.sentence: If we are judging whether someone is dangerous, our brains and bodies are <highlight>hard</highlight>-wired to react very quickly, within milliseconds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们在判断某人是否危险，我们的大脑和身体会本能地在几毫秒内做出非常快速的反应。

examination_example.sentence: We can reduce or even eliminate the negative effects of our quick, <highlight>hard</highlight>-wired responses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以减少甚至消除我们快速、本能的反应带来的负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: Our ability to mute our <highlight>hard</highlight>-wired reactions by pausing is what differentiates us from animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们通过停顿来抑制本能反应的能力是我们与动物的区别所在。

sense_info_list.en: not easily cut, pierced, or divided

examination_example.sentence: Here's what <highlight>hard</highlight> science reveals about eye contact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下是硬科学揭示的关于眼神交流的信息。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists say the compound is likely to cause cancer but have no <highlight>hard</highlight> scientific proof on the basis of the precautionary principle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们表示，这种化合物可能会导致癌症，但在预防原则的基础上还没有确凿的科学证据。

examination_example.sentence: Regenerative products could be a <highlight>hard</highlight> sell, because the concept is tough to define quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再生产品可能是一种强行推销，因为人们很难快速定义这个概念。

sense_info_list.en: very cold and severe
not pleasant or gentle

sense_info_list.zh: (水质)硬的; 酒精浓度高的

sense_info_list.en: to the fullest extent possible
sense_info_list.zh: 完全地; 最大程度上地

word_usage.usage:
表示“困难的”
hard指事情不好理解、处理或不容易做的。
difficult指因需要努力或技巧而难以做成、理解或处理的。尤指在一段时间内需耗费大量体力和精力才能完成的。
tough因存在或将会引发问题等而难以完成或处理的，尤指在情感上难以抉择的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变硬；使冷酷无情；变明确；升水
adj. 能吃苦耐劳的；强壮的；耐寒的

word_family.mean: adj. 坚实的；牢固的；坚硬的；猛烈的；沉重的；难以忍受的；困苦的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；有力的；强烈的；含无机盐的；软腭爆破音

sense_info_list.en: carried on with steady and earnest effort

examination_example.sentence: They try <highlight>hard</highlight> to appear optimistic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们努力表现得乐观。

examination_example.sentence: Why many people fight so <highlight>hard</highlight> for success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么很多人那么努力争取成功。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>hard</highlight>-won sense of self-acceptance is one of the joys of being an older woman.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种来之不易的自我接纳感是年长女性的乐趣之一。

sense_info_list.en: difficult to do or to understand

examination_example.sentence: It is not <highlight>hard</highlight> to mess up an interview.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把面试搞砸并不难。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>hard</highlight> to ignore social media as a screening tool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很难忽视社交媒体作为一种筛选工具。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes, it is a <highlight>hard</highlight> nut to crack without an expert's help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时，没有专家的帮助，这是一个很难解决的问题。

sense_info_list.en: not easily cut, pierced, or divided

examination_example.sentence: Because as human beings, we are <highlight>hard</highlight>-wired to optimize.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为作为人类，我们与生俱来就会优化。

examination_example.sentence: If personalities are <highlight>hard</highlight>-wired into our genes, what can governments do to help us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果个性是与生俱来的，那么政府能做些什么来帮助我们呢？

sense_info_list.en: with great effort or energy

word_usage.usage:
a hard time表示一个人的“困难时期”，而hard times则表示“不景气”。
示例：(1) I know he's had a hard time lately.
我知道他最近过的很艰难。
(2) You need to learn how to manage your money during hard times.
在不景气的时代，你得学会管理好自己的钱财。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: difficult 比 hard 较为正式, 侧重需要特别的能力、智力、判断力、技巧或勇气才能克服障碍。也可指深奥或抽象的难题。
指需大量思考和技巧或努力才能克服的任何困难。
含义广, 通俗用词, 与 easy 相对, 泛指任何难理解, 不好处理或不易做的事。
侧重指生活上令人难以承受的艰难困苦, 如疾病、贫穷等磨难。
侧重指质地坚硬、不易切割或有弹性, 一旦变形会很快恢复原形。
指硬实的难以按下、切开、弄碎等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变硬；使冷酷无情；变明确；升水

word_family.mean: adj. 坚实的；牢固的；坚硬的；猛烈的；沉重的；难以忍受的；困苦的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；有力的；强烈的；含无机盐的；软腭爆破音

sense_info_list.en: difficult to do or to understand

examination_example.sentence: If people do not know how much they are eating, it can be really <highlight>hard</highlight> for them to stick to a diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果人们不知道自己吃了多少，他们就很难坚持节食。

examination_example.sentence: Data shows us the ladder to success gets <highlight>harder</highlight> for women to climb the further up they go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数据显示，在通往成功的阶梯上，女性越往上爬越困难。

examination_example.sentence: It's not because fresh ingredients are <highlight>hard</highlight> to come by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并不是因为新鲜的食材很难获得。

sense_info_list.en: carried on with steady and earnest effort

examination_example.sentence: A conclusion has been drawn from many experiments that anumeric people have a <highlight>hard</highlight> time distinguishing quantities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从许多实验中得出的结论是：不懂数字的人很难区分数量。

examination_example.sentence: It was a <highlight>hard</highlight> task to remove the spilled substance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 清除溢出的物质是一项艰巨的任务。

examination_example.sentence: It was a <highlight>hard</highlight> and tedious job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项艰难而乏味的工作。

sense_info_list.en: not pleasant or gentle
not easily cut; pierced; or divided
with great effort or energy

word_usage.usage:
a hard time表示一个人的“困难时期”，而hard times则表示“不景气”。
示例：(1) I know he's had a hard time lately.
我知道他最近过的很艰难。
(2) You need to learn how to manage your money during hard times.
在不景气的时代，你得学会管理好自己的钱财。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: difficult 比 hard 较为正式，侧重需要特别的能力、智力、判断力、技巧或勇气才能克服障碍。也可指深奥或抽象的难题。
指需大量思考和技巧或努力才能克服的任何困难。
含义广，通俗用词，与 easy 相对，泛指任何难理解，不好处理或不易做的事。
侧重指生活上令人难以承受的艰难困苦，如疾病、贫穷等磨难。
侧重指质地坚硬、不易切割或有弹性，一旦变形会很快恢复原形。
指硬实的难以按下、切开、弄碎等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变硬；使冷酷无情；变明确；升水

word_family.mean: adj. 坚实的；牢固的；坚硬的；猛烈的；沉重的；难以忍受的；困苦的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；有力的；强烈的；含无机盐的；软腭爆破音

examination_example.sentence: You can't help wondering how <highlight>hard</highlight> it was for the people then to put all those rocks into place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不禁会想，当时人们把这些石头放回原处有多难。

examination_example.sentence: He built a hugely successful career with little more than plain old <highlight>hard</highlight> work and determination.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他建立了一个非常成功的职业生涯，不仅仅是简单的努力工作和决心。

examination_example.sentence: This was <highlight>harder</highlight> than it sounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这比听起来要难。

examination_example.sentence: No matter how attractive they look in the store, once I get them home they're unfailingly dry, <highlight>hard</highlight>, and tasteless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管它们在店里看起来有多吸引人，一旦我把它们带回家，它们就会永远干枯、坚硬、无味。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 坚硬的; 坚实的; 变硬
沉重的; 猛烈地; 用力地
有力的; 强烈的; 烈性的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 更困难的；更硬的；更冷酷无情的；更努力的；（hard的比较级）
n. 困难；坚硬；冷酷；硬性

word_family.mean: adj. 坚实的；牢固的；坚硬的；猛烈的；沉重的；难以忍受的；困苦的；可靠的；确凿无疑的；真实的；有力的；强烈的；含无机盐的；软腭爆破音

sense_info_list.en: with great effort or energy

examination_example.sentence: He played and practiced <highlight>hard</highlight> in the high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在高中时努力地训练。

examination_example.sentence: He also does well in his exams because he works very <highlight>hard</highlight> on his studies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的考试成绩也很好，因为他在学习上非常努力。

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>hard</highlight> the volunteer worked to get more kids back to school!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了让更多的孩子重返校园，志愿者是多么努力啊！

sense_info_list.en: difficult to understand, do, experience, or deal with

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>hardest</highlight> part about any task is getting started.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何任务最难的部分是开始。

examination_example.sentence: It didn't look that <highlight>hard</highlight>—just move your legs while you were standing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这看起来并不难——只要在你站立的时候移动你的腿。

examination_example.sentence: It was so <highlight>hard</highlight> for her to accept this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让她很难接受。

sense_info_list.en: not easily cut, pierced, or divided
sense_info_list.zh: 坚硬的; 坚实的; 变硬

examination_example.sentence: There are also "<highlight>hard</highlight>" martial arts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也有“硬”的武术。

examination_example.sentence: The world is full of yin and yang: dark and light, soft and <highlight>hard</highlight>, female and male.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界充满了阴和阳：黑暗和光明，柔软和坚硬，女性和男性。

examination_example.sentence: It is between a rock and a <highlight>hard</highlight> place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它介于岩石和坚硬的地方之间。

sense_info_list.en: not pleasant or gentle

examination_example.sentence: Because Yu Gong had strong will and <highlight>hard</highlight> work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为愚公有坚强的意志和勤奋的精神。

examination_example.sentence: People shouldn't push their kids so <highlight>hard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们不应该把孩子逼得太紧。

sense_info_list.zh: 沉重的; 猛烈地; 用力地

examination_example.sentence: shouldn't push their kids so <highlight>hard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不应该把他们的孩子逼得那么紧

examination_example.sentence: Try to be relaxed and don't hold the pencil so <highlight>hard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽量放松，不要用力握铅笔。

examination_example.sentence: They can be cooked in lots of ways such as fried or <highlight>hard</highlight>-boiled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们可以通过多种方式烹饪，例如油炸或煮熟。

sense_info_list.zh: 有力的; 强烈的; 烈性的

examination_example.sentence: Use of <highlight>hard</highlight> drugs is increasing as a result of these drugs becoming cheaper and easier to buy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于这些药物变得更便宜和更容易购买，烈性药物的使用正在增加。

word_usage.usage:
hard表示“猛烈地”时，相当于heavily。可以用来形容雨/雪下的很大。
如：It’s raining hard/heavily.雨下得正大。

a hard time表示一个人的“困难时期”，而hard times则表示“不景气”。
示例：(1) I know he's had a hard time lately.
我知道他最近过的很艰难。
(2) You need to learn how to manage your money during hard times.
在不景气的时代，你得学会管理好自己的钱财。
